title: Mit manipal cse vs pes rr cse
content: I have an option between joining these two colleges what should I opt for? Please answer with reason. I know pes is strict compared to mit but how do they compare in placements. And if you had this choice would you still choose pes?

comments.body: MIT cse no brainer
Any reasoning behind it? In terms of placement or better education
Go for PES undoubtedly...Even I got CSE in PES in EC campus.
Manipal cs any day
Any reason,  please i need an explanation to make a decision.

if your focus is only placements then pes, we have better placement percentage, so you are more likely to land a job here

if you want to have good quality of life then manipal

also i think pes is a cheaper option, so thats another reason to choose pes
Placement is same , now choose between great college life and no college life. And from what I have heard studies will be chiller in manipal too making scoring a good cgpa easier.
Mit manipal no doubt
Between manipal and rvce

PES For placements/academics/blr location

Manipal for better campus life/foreign opportunities
I want to pursue mtech afterwards, so would you say manipal is better than that?
Academics are harder at manipal
Manipal
Neither would give any significant advantage.
Manipal Main Campus CSE >> PES ECC CSE

Rvce Cse > Manipal CSE (normally)
Rvce cse = PES CSE (if ur gpa in pes is 9+)
Why does this guy hate ec so muchğŸ’€ğŸ™
Ikr literally every other comment of his is this hate train
Ey me too bro .. I am going there only
foreign opportunities really?
